channel.title: [help]
channel.description:
i want to put my client on www.000webhost.com and make it into a WEBCLIENT... i have the html code and i have jar and signed my client.(not fimilar with 000webhost.com) but i read somewhere that i need to make a new folder and put both .jar and html in there EX: http://www.mysite.com/client/play.html (both files are in the /client/ part) heres a pic where i upload shit... [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/v3oa46.jpg[/img]
... so basically i want to put my webclient on 000webhost.com. and im stuck
